channel.title: 2008rune [webclient] remake!
channel.description:
Ok So here is my project... Basically Its Runescape from 2005 Loading a cache from 2008 That's why It's called "The old Future"
WECLIENT IS WORKING NOW: [url=http://activaler.webs.com/index.html]http://activaler.webs.com/index.html[/url] WECLIENT IS WORKING NOW: [url=http://activaler.webs.com/index.html]http://activaler.webs.com/index.html[/url] WECLIENT IS WORKING NOW: [url=http://activaler.webs.com/index.html]http://activaler.webs.com/index.html[/url]
Server Features Up to now:
[b]SKILLS[/b]
COMBAT Attack: 85% Have to finish the correct animations. Strength: 90% Testing To see If everything is working. Defense: 55% Working Perfectly expect Animations, Uses Attack Animations. Health Points: 100% No more to do with this. Ranged: 85% Working on specs. Prayer:100% Everything Is correct. Mage:50% Working on cast use runes (:
Rune-Crafting Every single altar works with a talisman, working to make it work, with a "tiara" depending on its own element. Still have to add Multiple-Runes. I can say RuneCrafting is around a 70% and 80%
Agility Every Single Obstacle Works, Still have to work on Everysingle individual Obstacle such as jumping over a fence, etc, etc.
Herblore Should work on it more, Finished around a 90% :D
Thieving Cools bro, thieving is around a 95% just gotta fix the spamming and some stalls, including some random chests around runescape...
Crafting Nothing much to say, It works around a 99% but still have to test it more! :D
Fletching Umm fletching.. I dunt know. Just joking flecthing is around a 85% Everything should work, but haven't tested.
Slayer Boring, Will Update you with it later... LOL
Mining Yep 99% Just have to fix the respawn times :D , should have a great economy on the server and everything works with mining...
Smithing Well... Everything works :DD except for the worktable in lumbridge, (no big problem)
Fishing Not tested... Should work atleast a 50%
Cooking Well around a 90% gotta make fish burn more often lol...
Firemaking 99% Gotta fix the clipping.. ): My fail but shouldn't be as hard to fix it..
Woodcutting All I can say is, Woodcutting is the best working skill up to now...
Farming It should work perfectly but I dont know how to farm (Fail)
Now server Features :D
Home Spawn: 100% NPC Clipping: 75% Items Left on death: 100% Exp Lock: Works Equipment Stats: 100% *Working Bonuses* Xp Total: Just like real Runescape :D 90% Prayer Drains: Perfect Mage Teleport Requiere runes, and the requiered level! Friends List and chat: Fixed all bugs Duplication Bugs: NONE Ignore list: Works, You can see their chat! Clan chat: Should work fine! Tools: Should be able to switch between 377 deob and 562!! Emotes work: Perfect Added gnome Gliders, that work *Obviously* Skill Capes Work, You can buy them at their respective NPC Skill master located as real Runescape. Every single Npc is on its perfect location. Trading sucks LOL SINGLE AND DOUBLE DOORS WORK PERFECT :D Added 2 Ingame Quests! Ladders work, Going up, Down and whatevers :D Shops are about a 40% done...
That Is pretty Much it, I will be giving away 25 Server slots, for the first people to contact me. The server is currently under ALPHA, and should be available for everyone once a webclient is done and a webstie!
If you are interested in helping by coding then just Send me a message too. I Need a little bit of help of coders atm. I will accept only 5 Coders, Hosting under VPS. And to apply for staff just leave a comment below Saying
1.- Why would you like to be staff. 2.- How many servers have you been staff on. 3.- If you could help Donating $$ To the server And why 4.- Are Interested helping by advertising. 5.- Age 6.- How long you could be online a week.
ADMINS WILL BE ABLE TO ENJOY ALPHA INCLUDING THE 25 PEOPLE WHO APPLY TO PLAY.
Pictures are attached at the bottom of this post ;D wont post much cuz I want people to wait lol
Credits go to: Forgotten People who made Tutorials: 90% P.I. Source: 8% Me: 1% Testers: 1%

item.title: 2008rune [webclient] remake!
item.dc:creator: @Johnhannes Johnhannes
item.description:
@Johnhannes wrote:

Ok So here is my project…
Basically Its Runescape from 2005 Loading a cache from 2008
That’s why It’s called “The old Future”

WECLIENT IS WORKING NOW: http://activaler.webs.com/index.html
WECLIENT IS WORKING NOW: http://activaler.webs.com/index.html
WECLIENT IS WORKING NOW: http://activaler.webs.com/index.html

Server Features Up to now:

SKILLS

COMBAT
Attack: 85% Have to finish the correct animations.
Strength: 90% Testing To see If everything is working.
Defense: 55% Working Perfectly expect Animations, Uses Attack Animations.
Health Points: 100% No more to do with this.
Ranged: 85% Working on specs.
Prayer:100% Everything Is correct.
Mage:50% Working on cast use runes (:

Rune-Crafting
Every single altar works with a talisman, working to
make it work, with a “tiara” depending on its own element.
Still have to add Multiple-Runes.
I can say RuneCrafting is around a 70% and 80%

Agility
Every Single Obstacle Works,
Still have to work on Everysingle individual
Obstacle such as jumping over a fence, etc, etc.

Herblore
Should work on it more,
Finished around a 90%

Thieving
Cools bro, thieving is around a 95%
just gotta fix the spamming and some
stalls, including some random chests around
runescape…

Crafting
Nothing much to say, It works around
a 99% but still have to test it more!

Fletching
Umm fletching… I dunt know.
Just joking flecthing is around a 85%
Everything should work, but haven’t tested.

Slayer
Boring, Will Update you with it later… LOL

Mining
Yep 99% Just have to fix the
respawn times , should have a great economy
on the server and everything works with mining…

Smithing
Well… Everything works :DD
except for the worktable in
lumbridge, (no big problem)

Fishing
Not tested… Should work atleast
a 50%

Cooking
Well around a 90% gotta make fish burn
more often lol…

Firemaking
99% Gotta fix the clipping… ):
My fail but shouldn’t be as hard to fix it…

Woodcutting
All I can say is, Woodcutting is
the best working skill up to now…

Farming
It should work perfectly but I dont
know how to farm (Fail)

Now server Features

Home Spawn: 100%
NPC Clipping: 75%
Items Left on death: 100%
Exp Lock: Works
Equipment Stats: 100% Working Bonuses
Xp Total: Just like real Runescape 90%
Prayer Drains: Perfect
Mage Teleport Requiere runes, and the requiered level!
Friends List and chat: Fixed all bugs
Duplication Bugs: NONE
Ignore list: Works, You can see their chat!
Clan chat: Should work fine!
Tools: Should be able to switch between 377 deob and 562!!
Emotes work: Perfect
Added gnome Gliders, that work Obviously
Skill Capes Work, You can buy them at their respective NPC Skill master located as real Runescape.
Every single Npc is on its perfect location.
Trading sucks LOL
SINGLE AND DOUBLE DOORS WORK PERFECT
Added 2 Ingame Quests!
Ladders work, Going up, Down and whatevers
Shops are about a 40% done…

That Is pretty Much it, I will be giving away 25 Server slots, for the first people to contact me.
The server is currently under ALPHA, and should be available for everyone once a webclient
is done and a webstie!

If you are interested in helping by coding then just Send me a message too.
I Need a little bit of help of coders atm. I will accept only 5 Coders, Hosting under
VPS. And to apply for staff just leave a comment below Saying

1.- Why would you like to be staff.
2.- How many servers have you been staff on.
3.- If you could help Donating $$ To the server And why
4.- Are Interested helping by advertising.
5.- Age
6.- How long you could be online a week.

ADMINS WILL BE ABLE TO ENJOY ALPHA INCLUDING THE 25 PEOPLE
WHO APPLY TO PLAY.

Pictures are attached at the bottom of this post ;D
wont post much cuz I want people to wait lol
